LanguageData.CA_Story_TheTree_QuestDesc: Creepy whispers echo around the village. They seem to be coming from the direction of the anima tree.
LanguageData.Story_Start_Dia1: Listen human, the ancient creature awoke. We may all perish unless we empower a savior to gather the ancient spells in order to battle the creature when it is ready to strike.
LanguageData.Story_Start_Dia1_Me: Yes, you have the potential that is required to wield the power of the ancient scrolls. Start the journey, acquire the spells and save this planet from doom. Do you accept the Ancient Gift?
LanguageData.Story_Start_Dia1_Me_NoChoice: Guess I don't have much of a choice, I accept.
LanguageData.Story_Start_Dia1_Me_SomeoneBetter: Sorry, I can't, but there may be someone better suited...
LanguageData.Story_Start_Dia1_Me_End_Accepted: The location of the first spell will reveal itself to you soon. Good luck on your journey, chosen one.
LanguageData.Story_Start_Dia1_Me_End_GiftAlreadyRecie: The ancient gift was already granted, don't disturb me any longer.
LanguageData.Story_Start_Dia1_1_Neg_Option2: {0} can't fulfill {1} duty, that's why I would like to take on the gift.
LanguageData.CA_Story_ReceivedGiftLetterDesc: {0} has been granted the ancient gift. {0} also started to remember 2 spells that {1} never knew before. You can find more info in {0}'s health tab.
LanguageData.CA_Story_Start_EnableAncientMachines: Help me contact the ancient machines below the planet's surface.
LanguageData.CA_Story_Start_MachinesEnabled: As you wish... hmmm, the machines have become active again and continue fulfilling their work.
LanguageData.CA_Story_Start_MachinesDisabled: As you wish... hmmm, the machines have become dormant and remain inactive.
